title: Personal Portfolio
description: A responsive personal portfolio website built with HTML to showcase projects and skills, hosted on GitHub Pages.

title: PID Game
description: A JavaScript-based interactive game application demonstrating PID control concepts through engaging gameplay mechanics.

title: Test Auth
description: Facebook login integration with Flask - a web application demonstrating social media authentication workflows.

title: PingApp
description: A simple app to keep render server awake - Python application built with Kivy for Android to maintain server uptime.

title: ID Code
description: FastAPI application with SQLAlchemy and Celery for distributed task processing and database management.

title: PIPELINE
description: Image annotation service leveraging FastAPI and Celery for background task processing with vision-language models via Ollama.

title: SentinelNet
description: Lightweight, scalable security camera platform connecting multiple IP cameras with FastAPI and OpenCV for video streaming and motion detection.

title: LangGraph Agent
description: Python implementation of an intelligent agent using LangGraph for complex reasoning and task automation.

title: MicrogridSim
description: MATLAB project for simulating and optimizing hybrid microgrid operations with PV solar, wind turbines, battery storage, and diesel generators.
